example

Class ArrowButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • example.ArrowButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ArrowButton
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Source code for Tutorial 1. Simple arrow button that fires one event when first clicked, then sends a stream of events while held down.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
